summary: The Deschutes River Conservancy Reauthorization Act of 2025 amends the Oregon Resource Conservation Act of 1996. It reauthorizes the Deschutes River Conservancy Working Group, modifying the composition of the group's board of directors. The bill also extends the authorization period to 2032 and increases the allowable administrative cost percentage. The focus is on conservation and management within the Deschutes River Basin, involving various stakeholders including environmental groups, agriculture, tribal representatives, and state and federal agencies.
